StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_DBAUpdateAddZipcode]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@zipcode varchar(9), @mcc varchar(5)
as
declare @orgid int, @deleted char(1), @login varchar(15), @updatedate date.me, @e.ec.vedate date.me
set @orgid = (select organiza.on_id from recrui.ng_organiza.on where MCC_CODE = @mcc)
set @deleted = 'N' set @login = (select system_user) set @updatedate = getdate() set @e.ec.vedate = getdate()
--- Add the zip code if it doesn't exist.
if not exists (select 1 from zip_code_assignment where zip_code = @zipcode)
begin insert into zip_code_assignment (organiza.on_id, zip_code, deleted, user_login, update_date, e.ec.ve_date) values (@orgid, @zipcode, @deleted, @login, @updatedate, @e.ec.vedate)
print @zipcode + ' ' + 'has been added'
end
--- If the zip code already exists, update the Org ID.
else begin update zip_code_assignment set organiza.on_id = @orgid, user_login = @login, update_date = getdate() where zip_code = @zipcode
print @zipcode + ' ' + 'has been updated'
end
